p: In striving to determine a COVID-19 potential treatment, the effectiveness of vitamin D towards this endemic health issue was evaluated [ 23]. In ancient times, food-enriched vitamin D, including codfish, was used to prevent or treat acute respiratory syndrome [ 24]. Vitamin D is well-known to play an essential role in the maintenance of bone health and to regulate calcium-phosphorus metabolism [ 23]. Moreover, this vitamin is also responsible for the modulation of the immune response in infectious and autoimmune disease [ 25, 26]. In particular, the active form of vitamin D, calcitriol has a defined role in immune function, with anti-inflammatory activity, inhibiting the overexpression of inflammatory cytokines (e.g., IL-1α, IL-1β, TNF-α) ( Figure 1) [ 27].
